remarks: Value of a nonzero complex number raised to a complex power plus one. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2016.)
statement:
cxp0d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
cxpefd.2 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= 0 ) $.
cxpefd.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
cxpp1d $p |- ( ph -> ( A ^c ( B + 1 ) ) = ( ( A ^c B ) x. A ) ) $.
